COURSE/  
DEGREE AWARDING  
INSTITUTIONS  
REQUIREMENTS    
UTME SUBJECTS  
SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  
    (i) OAU requires Mathematics, Government or 
Economics and any from History, Geography 
or Literature in English.  
  
MASS COMMUNICATION  
AAUA  
CARITAS  
 CRUTECH       
 ESUTECH     
MADONNA  
NASARAWA   
RSUST         
WELLSPRING  
WESTERN-DEL   
  
Two (2) ‘A’ level passes in 
Literature in English, 
Economics or  
Government.  
Five (5) SSC credit passes 
to include English  
Language, Literature in 
English and Government 
plus a pass in  
Mathematics.  
  
Literature in English, 
Economics and  
Government.  
  
DIRECT ENTRY  
(i) AAUA accepts two (2) ‘A’ level passes or   ND 
upper  credit  in  Mass  from 
 recognised institutions  
(ii) CRUTECH and ESUTECH accept ND upper 
credit or HND in Mass Communication from 
any recognized institution. Also requires Direct 
Entry applicants to possess the UTME 
requirements.    
(iii) RSUST accepts  
a) ND upper credit in relevant programmes 
or a Degree/HND not relevant to the 
programme for admissions to 200 level;  
b) A  Degree/HND  relevant  to 
 the  
programme for admissions to 300 level;  
(iv) WELLSPRING accepts two (2) ‘A’ level passes 
(including NABTEB), as well as ND in Mass  
Communication from recognised institutions.    
UTME  
(i) CRUTECH requires ‘O’ level credit passes in 
English Language, Mathematics, Literature in  
English, Government and any other Social 
Science or Arts subjects.   
(ii) ESUTECH requires ‘O’ level credit pass in  
 Economics  and  accepts  History  or  
Government.   
(iii) RSUST requires credits in Mathematics, 
Economics and any other three (3) subjects.
